subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Kim Mulkey, Baylor’s women’s basketball coach, was suspended for her team’s next N.C.A.A. tournament game for criticizing the officiating after a loss to Louisville last spring.
snippet: Kim Mulkey, Baylor’s women’s basketball coach, was suspended for her team’s next N.C.A.A. tournament game for criticizing the officiating after a loss to Louisville last spring.
